parts:
You are extracting UBX-MON-TXBUF from u-blox PDF manual pages.

This message has ARRAY fields for 6 targets (DDC, UART1, UART2, USB, SPI, reserved).

**CRITICAL: These fields are ARRAYS, not single values:**

| Offset | Type | Name | Description |
|--------|------|------|-------------|
| 0 | U2[6] | pending | Bytes pending per target (6 x U2 = 12 bytes) |
| 12 | U1[6] | usage | Buffer usage % per target (6 x U1 = 6 bytes) |
| 18 | U1[6] | peakUsage | Peak buffer usage % per target (6 x U1 = 6 bytes) |
| 24 | U1 | tUsage | Total buffer usage % |
| 25 | U1 | tPeakusage | Total peak buffer usage % |
| 26 | X1 | errors | Error bitmask |
| 27 | U1 | reserved0 | Reserved |

**IMPORTANT**: 
- `pending` is U2[6] (array of 6 U2 values), NOT a single U2
- `usage` is U1[6] (array of 6 U1 values), NOT a single U1
- `peakUsage` is U1[6] (array of 6 U1 values), NOT a single U1

Total payload length: 28 bytes.

Return using ubx_message_extraction tool.

{
  "ubx_message_extraction": {
    "message_class": "MON",
    "message_id": "TXBUF",
    "name": "UBX-MON-TXBUF",
    "description": "Transmitter buffer status",
    "type": "Periodic/polled",
    "is_deprecated": true,
    "deprecated_reason": "This message is deprecated in this protocol version. Use UBX-MON-COMMS instead.",
    "payload_length": 28,
    "fields": [
      {
        "byte_offset": 0,
        "type": "U2[6]",
        "name": "pending",
        "scale": null,
        "unit": "bytes",
        "description": "Number of bytes pending in transmitter buffer for each target"
      },
      {
        "byte_offset": 12,
        "type": "U1[6]",
        "name": "usage",
        "scale": null,
        "unit": "%",
        "description": "Maximum usage transmitter buffer during the last sysmon period for each target"
      },
      {
        "byte_offset": 18,
        "type": "U1[6]",
        "name": "peakUsage",
        "scale": null,
        "unit": "%",
        "description": "Maximum usage transmitter buffer for each target"
      },
      {
        "byte_offset": 24,
        "type": "U1",
        "name": "tUsage",
        "scale": null,
        "unit": "%",
        "description": "Maximum usage of transmitter buffer during the last sysmon period for all targets"
      },
      {
        "byte_offset": 25,
        "type": "U1",
        "name": "tPeakusage",
        "scale": null,
        "unit": "%",
        "description": "Maximum usage of transmitter buffer for all targets"
      },
      {
        "byte_offset": 26,
        "type": "X1",
        "name": "errors",
        "scale": null,
        "unit": null,
        "description": "Error bitmask",
        "sub_fields": [
          {
            "bits": "5:0",
            "type": "U:6",
            "name": "limit",
            "description": "Buffer limit of corresponding target reached"
          },
          {
            "bits": "6",
            "type": "U:1",
            "name": "mem",
            "description": "Memory Allocation error"
          },
          {
            "bits": "7",
            "type": "U:1",
            "name": "alloc",
            "description": "Allocation error (TX buffer full)"
          }
        ]
      },
      {
        "byte_offset": 27,
        "type": "U1",
        "name": "reserved0",
        "scale": null,
        "unit": null,
        "description": "Reserved"
      }
    ]
  }
}
